metadata.description: BOY CRAZY Joshi High is an elite school that most girls in Japan only dream of attending. Then one day everything changes–the allgirl school goes coed. There's just one catch: The girls outnumber the boys. So begins a wild, noholdsbarred competition for the boys of the school. Which smart and independentminded girl will rise above the fray?
metadata.name: Gakuen Prince
